subject: Just an idea...
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Hi all;


When I upload files to yahoo, I also open a hotmail page by starting a 
second session of Internet Explorer, I can see the e-mail notifications come 
up, and see what's on the group at the some time, and I can have my sound 
files accessible as well.


Frank-S

http://im.live.com/messenger/im/home/?source=hmtextlinkjuly07
